website_summaries.verdict: The Panasonic Lumix DMC-G7's excellent 4K capture will appeal to you if video is a priority, but its plastic body may be a turnoff.
cons: Not available as a body only

customer_reviews.title: Good quality footage.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know the camera game was so expensive, but for its price being considered a "budget" camera, this camera is actually amazing and has produced amazing footage with the right settings. Would recommend. Only downside is that because this is the EU version, the firmware has been set to only allow for 50fps at 1080p and not 60 or 120fps at 1080
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent!!! This camera is so light, has dual dials, gives lots of customization, lots of control, has a bunch of features and the 12-60 lens is fantastic. A very great buy for both stills and video.
customer_reviews.author: Socrates Nicolaou

customer_reviews.title: Came without lens and slightly damaged
customer_reviews.text: Camera quality is very good, by far an excellent mirrorless camera but the kit did not include a 12-60 lens it promised to provide which left me with a rather unusable camera body. After borrowing a lens from a friend I found that it worked well accept some minor issues including the build which is a little too 'plasticky' for my taste. While camera was performed well, I still returned it due to the missing lens which is really unfortunate. Overall, I recommend this camera but so many issues made me reduce the score to a 4 rather than 5.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for great money. Quality is really high. Minus: 30min record limit
customer_reviews.author: Dušan Salač

customer_reviews.title: Great micro four thirds camera
customer_reviews.text: A great camera and so very versatile. Lovely to hold, especially for someone with a smaller hand. It's good in low light conditions too. The ability to have a silent shutter is good for times when you don't want to intrude on an occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Sj, Flintshire

customer_reviews.title: Very good product excellent results
customer_reviews.text: Body plastic bit disappointed compared to G2 but features outstanding easy to use excellent camera
customer_reviews.author: P. R. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Great beginners camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great for beginners who are looking to move into photography and film making, currently been using this for 6 months now the bukd quality is great the dials are perfect in changing settings quickly. For the price it has exceed my expectations
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Bonner

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I think one of the best cameras you can buy in that price range.
customer_reviews.author: szotuuu

customer_reviews.title: Awesome budget 4K Dslr
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as the GH5 but a good 4k alternative, has 1080p 50fps and 4k burst mode, I am very impressed for the price range.
customer_reviews.author: Jeevan Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera! :D
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera! I got it super fast (1 or 2 days). Amazing quality. Light in the hand, but extremly good quality!
customer_reviews.author: David Sundt

customer_reviews.title: very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very light, not too big and easy to use. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Krabate

customer_reviews.title: ... bit of a gamble because I have always had amazing results from Canon products
customer_reviews.text: I honestly thought switching from Canon to Panasonic was a bit of a gamble because I have always had amazing results from Canon products. This camera is really easy to use straight out the box without reading any manuals and offers an amazing amount of settings and options not to mention the fact that the picture quality is unreal! I love this camera, it shoots 4K, it's amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Vinnie

customer_reviews.title: Mini-GH4
customer_reviews.text: For this price a very good camera - it's a Mini-GH4 and if you don't need all professionell video-specs of the GH4 and like a compact body, then you should go with the G7.
customer_reviews.author: Edelweiss

customer_reviews.title: Great for Videos
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, Very good at picture quality and amazing at videos. If you are getting this camera, the main reason should be for videos. The pictures are great but the main purpose of the camera is for 4k videos.
customer_reviews.author: Jaeden E Tech

customer_reviews.title: and its annoying:
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a vlogging camera, and honestly the only downside is the auto focus and battery life. I'm using the kit lens and I notice quite a bit of image noise at low ISO, not sure if it's a setting I need to change or not, but it's definitely there...and its annoying :D
customer_reviews.author: Love4MusicUK

customer_reviews.title: Videography heaven when matched to focal refucer and legacy lenses!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous camera for stills and video! Matched with a focal reducer vintage fd lenses and a fluid head monopod you have yourself a professional 4K setup for absolute peanuts! The results speak for themselves! Are there better 4K cameras tgat can also shot great stills....yes! But not close to the price point of this ! Add on the £100 cash back I received and this is just incredible!
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Waterman

customer_reviews.title: Fine pictures
customer_reviews.text: This is a brilliant camera and lens combination that is light and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mike  Brown

customer_reviews.title: Lumix G7 just rocks!
customer_reviews.text: the internet is full of great reviews about the G7... this camera is delightful and just exceeded my expectations. it corresponds to all the great reviews around.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Costa

customer_reviews.title: Great value 4k Lumix model
customer_reviews.text: An excellent camera providing all the benefits of the Lumix G range - lightweight, great viewfinder and screen, good lenses. This model is special because the 4k functionaity means you can catch perfect stills from a short bust of activity or record great 4k video. Value for money giving a camera that has all the features wanted for any requirement whilst being able to be given to family to be used in a fully automatic manner. Recommend the YouTube videos on using the G range and the special features of this model.
customer_reviews.author: M J Clark

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera with tons of features
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Camera with tons of features, bells and whistles, amazing 4k. Has taken my shots to another level. Pros: Lots of really good features well above it's price range. Cons: Build quality feels a little cheap. due to light weight non durable plastic housing. Overal as long as you look after the camera and treat with extra care it should be fine. Everything else is spot on. Defiantly worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use.. manual control of video... if you don't care about low light photography, this is your camera
customer_reviews.author: athanasios plomaritis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera but need to study the instructions to get the best out of it
customer_reviews.author: peter lower

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera, very fast shipping and great price ! Couldn't ask for more !
customer_reviews.author: Johnhk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: so happy with it. Item like descriptet absolutely new. Super happy and came even before the actual date
customer_reviews.author: anna carolina di bitonto

customer_reviews.title: but the new features and processing capabilities make it a joy to use
customer_reviews.text: A bit more "boxy" and, perhaps larger than my previous GH2, but the new features and processing capabilities make it a joy to use. Unless you need all the bells and whistles, this is a perfect alternative to the GH4 (or GX8?)
customer_reviews.author: Enigma

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pictures but its cheap plastic body
customer_reviews.text: Good camera, excellent pictures (of course depending of your lens) and video results. The autofocus impressively fast and smart. But its cheap plastic body may be a turnoff.
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: No English Manual
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it -- it arrived within two days -- from Athens. The printed manual was not in English. Otherwise fine.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Good quality 4k video at this price is mire than enough
customer_reviews.text: Pros : great 4k video, decent photo, touch screen monitor, unique 4k photo feature, good brand, built in flash is a bonus Cons : size is too small for comfortable handeling but adding a battery pack might increase size.
customer_reviews.author: The review man

customer_reviews.title: A lot of camera for your money (save those moments in 4K and 8MB stills while recording)
customer_reviews.text: Didn't buy it from Amazon as I was in a hurry to get the double cash back, so picked one up from my local Curry's. Coming from the APS C sensor camp (had the Samsung NX1000) i was worried that M4/3 sensor would be a downgrade in terms of low light photography. Oh boy I was in for a surpise... great low light photography, fast autofocus, 4K video, optical view finder, great kit lens, what else to ask for at this price?
customer_reviews.author: Socrates

customer_reviews.title: Great for 4K video... Not DSLR quality for photos
customer_reviews.text: Can't fault the 4K video with the added ability to change lenses it's great. However auto focus in videos is slow so I use manual or the touch screen to focus which is not a biggy. I chose this over th A3600 due to the articulating screen and the huge price difference. For photography it's barley better than a good mobile phone camera. The micro four thirds sensor holds this camera back in terms of photography. I now carry a D5200 for pictures and this for video. As soon as new camera with 4K, larger sensor and a articulating screen is available I'm selling this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Racer80

customer_reviews.title: It would've been useful if someone reviewing the camera had mentioned how loud ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera with the 14-140 kit lens. It would've been useful if someone reviewing the camera had mentioned how loud and horrible the image stabilisation system is. Awful, awful system am very dissapointed not even an external mic will solve the problem as the external mic will also pick up the noise the lens makes.
customer_reviews.author: Alex
